content:
In the operating zone of the Defense Forces of South of Ukraine as of March 25, 2024, a daily counter -bacity struggle continues.

This is stated inmessageGroup.

“The enemy does not leave the intention to knock out our units from the occupied positions. He carried out 3 assaults in the Orikhiv direction, of which 1 in the area of the robot, 1 in the area of equivalent and 1 in the Staromayorsky area, ” - said the defense forces of the South of Ukraine.

On the Left Bank of the Dnieper, the enemy decided on 1 storm of Ukrainian positions. Having suffered losses, he went to his starting positions.

Ukrainian fighters continue to take comprehensive measures to keep and strengthen positions.

The invaders do not stop air intelligence, press with artillery shelling, cause aviation blows, use a large number of shock drones of different types.

"There are no ships of hostile non -fleet in the Black and Azov Seas," - reported the defense forces of southern Ukraine.

Russian rocket launchers, as noted, are at the points of base.

According to the Army, according to the General Staff of the Armed Forces, for the last day at the fronthappened60 wickednesses, almost half of them are in the Novopavlovsky direction.
title: Russian invaders have carried out four assaults in the operating zone of the South Defense Forces
description: This is stated in the community message. “The enemy does not leave the intentions to knock out ours ...
author: Army Inform
